results.name: Disney High School Musical 3: Senior Year Dance

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 / Vista SP2 / XP SP3
  • Processor: Pentium 4 class or AMD Athlon processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64 MB DirectX 9.0c-compatible, 3D video card (NVIDIA GeForce, ATI Radeon, or equivalent) with Hardware Transform and Lighting capability.
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16-bit DirectX 9-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 2.0 Intel Pentium 4 class or better processor is required for onboard (built-in) integrated chipsets (e.g., Intel on-board 8xx/9xx series chipsets, SiS and S3 series, ATI Mobility Radeon 7500 & X1300)
